column4: hi, i can use my wireless card to connect to the internet and it works fine, but i cant browse the network places. i can browse my wired network places but not wireless. however everyone else can see and browse my computer wirelessly.
could static ip's cause my wireless network places to go away?
are  you connecting with wireless and wired at the same time?
from my experience that doesn't go so well. you have to use one or the other.. although i have only tried using both a very few times.
